snippet: The training focuses on how to defend civilian targets on a continent that has become a significant battleground in the war against militant Islam.
abstract: United States military conducts training exercises throughout Africa aimed at assisting regional forces in protecting civilians amid surge in Islamist violence; effort marks shift from focus on peacekeeping to counter-terrorism, and draws on lessons learned in Afghanistan and Iraq.
